snippet: Has Obamacare made it un-P.C. to be concerned by a serious burden on a middle-class family’s well-being?
abstract: Op-Ed article by editor and psychotherapist Lori Gottlieb notes complaining about the increase in  health care premiums due to reform law seems to have become taboo, judging from reactions of her friends; contends it seems Pres Obama and those whose insurance coverage has remained unchanged do not care much about the relatively small percentage of Americans with canceled coverage and no viable replacement.
lead_paragraph: Has Obamacare made it un-P.C. to be concerned by a serious burden on a middle-class family’s well-being?

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
